meta.description: Disallow use of chained assignment expressions

content.introduction:
Disallow use of chained assignment expressions
Table of ContentsRule DetailsOptionsignoreNonDeclarationRelated RulesVersionResources
Chaining the assignment of variables can lead to unexpected results and be difficult to read.
(function(){constfoo=bar=0;// Did you mean `foo = bar == 0`?bar=1;// This will not fail since `bar` is not constant.})();console.log(bar);// This will output 1 since `bar` is not scoped.12345Copy code to clipboard
